get.description: Get the lists that a movie has been added to

results.title: The Return
results.overview: After twenty years away, Odysseus washes up on the shores of Ithaca, haggard and unrecognizable. The king has finally returned home, but much has changed in his kingdom since he left to fight in the Trojan war.

results.title: Sujo
results.overview: When a cartel gunman is killed, he leaves behind Sujo, his beloved four-year-old son. The shadow of violence surrounds Sujo during each stage of his life in the isolated Mexican countryside. As he grows into a man, Sujo finds that fulfilling his father’s destiny may be inescapable.

results.title: Queer
results.overview: In 1950s Mexico City, William Lee, an American expat in his late forties, leads a solitary life amidst a small American community. However, the arrival in town of Eugene Allerton, a young student, stirs William into finally establishing a meaningful connection with someone.

results.title: Blue Period
results.overview: Yatora is the perfect high school student, with good grades and lots of friends. It's an effortless performance, and, ultimately… a dull one. But he wanders into the art room one day, and a lone painting captures his eye, awakening him to a kind of beauty he never knew. Compelled and consumed, he dives in headfirst—and he's about to learn how savage and unforgiving art can be!

results.title: The Man in the White Van
results.original_title: The Man in the White Van
results.overview: In early 1970s Florida, an ominous white van stalks young women. A teenage girl is the latest victim, but this one won't stay a victim.

results.title: The Snatch Thief
results.overview: In the Argentinian city of Tucumán, Miguel is making a living as a “motochorro”, a thief who snatches people’s belongings fromhis motorbike. When he steals the purse of Elena, an old woman, he ends up hurting her badly. After the brutal incident, Miguel is plagued by guilt and unable to forget about his victim. In an attempt to make things right, he conceals his true identity from the old woman and starts to take care of the injured and unsuspecting Elena. The closer he gets to her the more he becomes entangled in his own lies. Afraid of telling Elena the truth, Miguel continues to be haunted by his past and is unable to find true redemption.

results.title: The Day the Earth Blew Up: A Looney Tunes Movie
results.original_title: The Day the Earth Blew Up: A Looney Tunes Movie
results.overview: Porky and Daffy, the classic animated odd couple, turn into unlikely heroes when their antics at the local bubble gum factory uncover a secret alien mind control plot. Against all odds, the two are determined to save their town (and the world!)...that is if they don't drive each other crazy in the process.

results.title: The Last Dance
results.overview: A debt-ridden wedding planner inadvertently becomes a successful funeral planner. However, he must convince a traditional Taoist priest of his legitimacy to continue operating in the field.

results.title: Maria
results.overview: Maria Callas, the world's greatest opera singer, lives the last days of her life in 1970s Paris, as she confronts her identity and life.

results.title: Game Changers
results.overview: Ten days into the competition, the International Games are a complete fiasco for the French delegation as they’ve consistently failed to win any gold medals. All hopes now rest on Paul, an outstanding shooting champion, though somewhat immature and not particularly clever. As the event draws near, he has to share his room with Jacob, a carefree swimmer from Vanuatu, who seems more focused on the village’s “extra-curricular activities” than on his own races.

results.title: Kraven the Hunter
results.overview: Kraven Kravinoff's complex relationship with his ruthless gangster father, Nikolai, starts him down a path of vengeance with brutal consequences, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

results.title: Anatomy
results.overview: Medical student Paula wins a place at an exclusive Heidelberg medical school. When the body of a young man she met on the train turns up on her dissection table, she begins to investigate the mysterious circumstances surrounding his death.

results.title: Werewolves
results.overview: A year after a supermoon’s light activated a dormant gene, transforming humans into bloodthirsty werewolves and causing nearly a billion deaths, the nightmare resurfaces as the supermoon rises again. Two scientists attempt to stop the mutation but fail, leaving those exposed to the moonlight to once again become feral werewolves. Chaos engulfs the streets as the scientists struggle to reach one of their family homes, now under siege by the savage creatures.

results.title: Chess Story
results.overview: 1938. While the Nazi troops march into Vienna, the lawyer Josef Bartok hastily tries to escape to the USA with his wife but is arrested by the Gestapo. Bartok remains steadfast and refuses to cooperate with the Gestapo that requires confidential information from him. Thrown into solitary confinement, Bartok is psychologically tormented for months and begins to weaken. However, when he steals an old book about chess it sets him on course to overcome the mental suffering inflicted upon him, until it becomes a dangerous obsession.

results.title: The Snow Sister
results.overview: A young boy whose grieving family has forgotten about Christmas forms an unexpected, healing bond with a bubbly girl full of holiday spirit.

results.title: Mufasa: The Lion King
results.overview: Mufasa, a cub lost and alone, meets a sympathetic lion named Taka, the heir to a royal bloodline. The chance meeting sets in motion an expansive journey of a group of misfits searching for their destiny.

results.title: The Order
results.overview: A string of violent robberies in the Pacific Northwest leads a veteran FBI agent into a domestic terrorist plot to overthrow the federal government.

results.title: Dirty Angels
results.overview: During the United States' 2021 withdrawal from Afghanistan, a group of female soldiers posing as medical relief are sent back in to rescue a group of kidnapped teenagers caught between ISIS and the Taliban.

results.title: Bonne Conduite
results.overview: Pauline has her own way of doing road safety: as a trainer in a point recovery center during the day, she becomes a serial killer of drivers at night.

results.title: Moana 2
results.overview: After receiving an unexpected call from her wayfinding ancestors, Moana journeys alongside Maui and a new crew to the far seas of Oceania and into dangerous, long-lost waters for an adventure unlike anything she's ever faced.

get.description: Get the release dates and certifications for a movie
Get the user reviews for a movie

results.author: CinemaSerf
results.content: When the King decides to decline an offer for a strategic betrothal for his daughter "Héra", a duel ensues that sees the would-be suitor "Wulf" swear vengeance on the house of "Helm Hammerhand" and the kingdom of "Rohan" before he flees to the mountains. Before too long, he has made his presence felt amongst the usually warring hill tribes and is soon a force to be reckoned with by the King. With his capital being attacked, "Helm" must lead from the front - but can he trust all of his nobles? It turns out that his daughter and this rebel were childhood friends but it's not just him she doesn't want to marry, she has far more independent designs for her life that don't include marriage at all, and these are actively encouraged by her handmaiden - herself a woman to be reckoned with. With duplicity and tragedy all around her, she must lead her people to the safety of the "Hornberg" to avoid the harshness of both her enemy and the brutal winter, but can they survive the ordeal that awaits them. This is a perfectly watchable animated fantasy adventure with the odd snippet of Howard Shore's original "Lord of the Rings - Two Towers" (2002) score to pep it up, but the standard of the animation is really quite underwhelming. It's all very two-dimensional and it seemed to me that virtually no effort has been made to synchronise the lips and the voices. The story is adequate enough, but stretched really quite thinly as it tops the two hour mark without anywhere near enough going on. There's isn't so much a war as a siege, and after about half an hour it felt more like this was an introduction to a character who is going to - whether JRR Tolkien likes it or not - deliver some more Middle Earth adventures for sequels galore. It really underplays the characterful mythology of the topic and takes a very disappointingly "Janet and John" approach to the mysteries and evils of that realm which was so well captured twenty-odd years ago by Peter Jackson.

get.description: Get the similiar movies based on genres and keywords

results.overview: Agent 007 battles mysterious Dr. No, a scientific genius bent on destroying the U.S. space program. As the countdown to disaster begins, Bond must go to Jamaica, where he encounters beautiful Honey Ryder, to confront a megalomaniacal villain in his massive island headquarters.
results.title: Dr. No

results.overview: Two years have passed since the final battle with Sephiroth. Though Midgar, city of mako, city of prosperity, has been reduced to ruins, its people slowly but steadily walk the road to reconstruction. However, a mysterious illness called Geostigma torments them. With no cure in sight, it brings death to the afflicted, one after another, robbing the people of their fledgling hope.
results.title: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children

results.overview: Agent 007 is back in the second installment of the James Bond series, this time battling a secret crime organization known as SPECTRE. Russians Rosa Klebb and Kronsteen are out to snatch a decoding device known as the Lektor, using the ravishing Tatiana to lure Bond into helping them. Bond willingly travels to meet Tatiana in Istanbul, where he must rely on his wits to escape with his life in a series of deadly encounters with the enemy.
results.title: From Russia with Love

results.overview: Special agent 007 comes face to face with one of the most notorious villains of all time, and now he must outwit and outgun the powerful tycoon to prevent him from cashing in on a devious scheme to raid Fort Knox -- and obliterate the world's economy.
results.title: Goldfinger

results.overview: In 25 AD, Judah Ben-Hur, a Jew in ancient Judea, opposes the occupying Roman empire.  Falsely accused by a Roman childhood friend-turned-overlord of trying to kill the Roman governor, he is put into slavery and his mother and sister are taken away as prisoners.
results.title: Ben-Hur

results.overview: A mysterious spacecraft captures Russian and American space capsules and brings the two superpowers to the brink of war. James Bond investigates the case in Japan and comes face to face with his archenemy Blofeld.
results.title: You Only Live Twice

results.overview: James Bond tracks his archnemesis, Ernst Blofeld, to a mountaintop retreat in the Swiss alps where he is training an army of beautiful, lethal women. Along the way, Bond falls for Italian contessa Tracy Draco, and marries her in order to get closer to Blofeld.
results.title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service

results.original_title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
results.overview: Harry Potter has lived under the stairs at his aunt and uncle's house his whole life. But on his 11th birthday, he learns he's a powerful wizard—with a place waiting for him at the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. As he learns to harness his newfound powers with the help of the school's kindly headmaster, Harry uncovers the truth about his parents' deaths—and about the villain who's to blame.
results.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone

results.original_title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
results.overview: When Harry Potter's name emerges from the Goblet of Fire, he becomes a competitor in a grueling battle for glory among three wizarding schools—the Triwizard Tournament. But since Harry never submitted his name for the Tournament, who did? Now Harry must confront a deadly dragon, fierce water demons and an enchanted maze only to find himself in the cruel grasp of He Who Must Not Be Named.
results.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

results.original_title: The Man with the Golden Gun
results.overview: Cool government operative James Bond searches for a stolen invention that can turn the sun's heat into a destructive weapon. He soon crosses paths with the menacing Francisco Scaramanga, a hitman so skilled he has a seven-figure working fee. Bond then joins forces with the swimsuit-clad Mary Goodnight, and together they track Scaramanga to a Thai tropical isle hideout where the killer-for-hire lures the slick spy into a deadly maze for a final duel.
results.title: The Man with the Golden Gun

results.overview: Russian and British submarines with nuclear missiles on board both vanish from sight without a trace. England and Russia both blame each other as James Bond tries to solve the riddle of the disappearing ships. But the KGB also has an agent on the case.
results.title: The Spy Who Loved Me

results.overview: After Drax Industries' Moonraker space shuttle is hijacked, secret agent James Bond is assigned to investigate, traveling to California to meet the company's owner, the mysterious Hugo Drax. With the help of scientist Dr. Holly Goodhead, Bond soon uncovers Drax's nefarious plans for humanity, all the while fending off an old nemesis, Jaws, and venturing to Venice, Rio, the Amazon...and even outer space.
results.title: Moonraker

results.overview: Humanity finds a mysterious object buried beneath the lunar surface and sets off to find its origins with the help of HAL 9000, the world's most advanced super computer.
results.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey

results.overview: Ray Ferrier is a divorced dockworker and less-than-perfect father. Soon after his ex-wife and her new husband drop off his teenage son and young daughter for a rare weekend visit, a strange and powerful lightning storm touches down.
results.title: War of the Worlds

results.overview: After a global war, the seaside kingdom known as the Valley of the Wind remains one of the last strongholds on Earth untouched by a poisonous jungle and the powerful insects that guard it. Led by the courageous Princess Nausicaä, the people of the Valley engage in an epic struggle to restore the bond between humanity and Earth.
results.title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind

results.overview: Axel Foley returns to the land of sunshine and palm trees to investigate the near-fatal shooting of police Captain Andrew Bogomil. With the help of Sgt. Taggart and Det. Rosewood, they soon uncover that the shooting is associated with a series of "alphabet" robberies masterminded by a heartless weapons kingpin—and the chase is on.
results.title: Beverly Hills Cop II

results.overview: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.
results.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory

results.original_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
results.overview: Young hobbit Frodo Baggins, after inheriting a mysterious ring from his uncle Bilbo, must leave his home in order to keep it from falling into the hands of its evil creator. Along the way, a fellowship is formed to protect the ringbearer and make sure that the ring arrives at its final destination: Mt. Doom, the only place where it can be destroyed.
results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

results.original_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
results.overview: Frodo Baggins and the other members of the Fellowship continue on their sacred quest to destroy the One Ring--but on separate paths. Their destinies lie at two towers--Orthanc Tower in Isengard, where the corrupt wizard Saruman awaits, and Sauron's fortress at Barad-dur, deep within the dark lands of Mordor. Frodo and Sam are trekking to Mordor to destroy the One Ring of Power while Gimli, Legolas and Aragorn search for the orc-captured Merry and Pippin. All along, nefarious wizard Saruman awaits the Fellowship members at the Orthanc Tower in Isengard.
results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

results.original_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
results.overview: As armies mass for a final battle that will decide the fate of the world--and powerful, ancient forces of Light and Dark compete to determine the outcome--one member of the Fellowship of the Ring is revealed as the noble heir to the throne of the Kings of Men. Yet, the sole hope for triumph over evil lies with a brave hobbit, Frodo, who, accompanied by his loyal friend Sam and the hideous, wretched Gollum, ventures deep into the very dark heart of Mordor on his seemingly impossible quest to destroy the Ring of Power.​
results.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

get.description: Get the translations for a movie

data.overview: A sudden attack by Wulf, a clever and traitorous lord of Rohan seeking vengeance for the death of his father, forces Helm Hammerhand, the King of Rohan, and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg.
data.tagline: Hope has yet to abandon these lands.

data.overview: Se déroulant 183 ans avant les événements de la trilogie de films originale, "Le Seigneur des Anneaux : La Guerre des Rohirrim" raconte le destin de la maison de Helm Mainmarteau, le roi légendaire du Rohan. Après une attaque-surprise menée par Wulf, un impitoyable et rusé seigneur Dunlending souhaitant venger la mort de son père, Helm et son peuple doivent se défendre dans une ultime bataille en se réfugiant dans l'ancienne forteresse de Fort-le-Cor, connue plus tard sous le nom de gouffre de Helm. Se trouvant dans une situation de plus en plus désespérée, Héra, fille de Helm, devra faire preuve de courage pour mener la résistance face à un ennemi redoutable déterminé à les anéantir.
data.title: Le Seigneur des Anneaux : La Guerre des Rohirrim

data.overview: 183 évvel „A Gyűrűk Ura: A két torony” eseményei előtt: Pörölykezű Helm Rohan új, hatalmas királya Edorasban. Amikor királyságát a dúnföldiek fenyegetik, Edoras gyenge védművei miatt új, bevehetetlen erődítményt kezd építeni: a Kürtvárat a Helm-szurdokban. Véres csatára kerül sor, amely beíródik Középfölde történelemkönyvébe.
data.title: A Gyűrűk Ura: A rohírok háborúja

data.overview: Внезапное нападение Вульфа, умного и безжалостного лорда Данленда, жаждущего отомстить за смерть своего отца, вынуждает Хельма Молоторукого, короля Рохана, и его людей обороняться в древней крепости Хорнбург.
data.title: Властелин Колец: Война Рохирримов

data.overview: Der Film erzählt vom Schicksal des Hauses von Helm Hammerhand, dem legendären König von Rohan. Wulf, ein ebenso gerissener wie skrupelloser Fürst der Dunländer, sinnt auf Rache für den Tod seines Vaters. Als er Helm und seine Gefolgsleute unerwartet angreift, sind diese gezwungen, sich in der alten Festung Hornburg, die später unter dem Namen Helms Klamm Bekanntheit erlangen wird, zu einem wagemutigen letzten Gefecht zu stellen. In einer zunehmend verzweifelten Lage muss Helms Tochter Héra den Willen aufbringen, den Widerstand gegen einen tödlichen Feind anzuführen – einen Feind, der nicht weniger will als ihre völlige Vernichtung.
data.title: Der Herr der Ringe: Die Schlacht der Rohirrim

data.overview: Explora la "historia no contada" del Abismo de Helm, cientos de años antes de la mítica batalla, y de su fundador, Helm Hammerhand, Rey de Rohan.
data.title: El señor de los anillos: La guerra de los Rohirrim

data.overview: 로한의 전설적인 왕 무쇠주먹 ‘헬름’은 공주 ‘헤라’와 자신의 아들 ‘울프’와의 결혼을 요구하는 웨스트마크 영주인 ‘프레카’와 결투를 벌이다 예기치 않게 그를 죽이고 만다. 아버지의 죽음에 격분하여 복수를 다짐하고 사라진 ‘울프’. 어느 날, 그는 무자비한 던랜드인을 이끌고 나타나 로한을 공격한다. ‘헬름’과 그의 아들 ‘할레스’와 ‘하마’, 그리고 기마대 로히림이 공격에 맞서지만 영주들의 배신으로 크게 패배하며 나팔 산성으로 퇴각하게 된다. ‘할레스’와 ‘하마’ 두 왕자를 모두 잃은 ‘헬름’과 ‘헤라’는 ‘울프’와 대규모 던랜드 군대에 의해 나팔 산성에 고립된 상황에서 모두의 목숨을 건 마지막 전투를 준비한다.
data.title: 반지의 제왕: 로히림의 전쟁

data.overview: ركز على ملك روهان العظيم ، هيلم هامرهاند ، ومعركة أسطورية ساعدت في تشكيل الأرض الوسطى مما أدى إلى أحداث سيد الخواتم.

Сюжет розповідає про долю Дому Гельма Молоторукого, легендарного короля Рогану. На нього несподівано нападає Вулф – кмітливий і безжальний володар Дунланду, що прагне помститися за смерть свого батька. Він змушує Гельма і його людей вступити у ризикований останній бій у стародавній фортеці Горнбурґ, яка згодом стане відомою як Гельмовий Яр. Опинившись у безвихідному становищі, Гера, дочка Гельма, повинна зібратися з духом, щоб очолити опір проти смертоносного ворога, який жадає їхнього цілковитого винищення.
data.tagline: Забути про сумніви, забути про відчай, знайти справжню відвагу.
data.title: Володар перснів: Війна рогіримів

data.overview: Lấy bối cảnh 183 năm trước những sự kiện trong bộ ba phim gốc, “Chúa Tể Của Những Chiếc Nhẫn: Cuộc Chiến Của Rohirrim" kể về số phận của Gia tộc của Helm Hammerhand, vị vua huyền thoại của Rohan. Cuộc tấn công bất ngờ của Wulf, lãnh chúa xảo trá và tàn nhẫn của tộc Dunlending, nhằm báo thù cho cái chết của cha hắn, đã buộc Helm và thần dân của ngài phải chống cự trong pháo đài cổ Hornburg - một thành trì vững chãi sau này được biết đến với tên gọi Helm's Deep. Tình thế ngày càng tuyệt vọng, Héra, con gái của Helm, phải dốc hết sức dẫn dắt cuộc chiến chống lại kẻ địch nguy hiểm, quyết tâm tiêu diệt bọn chúng.
data.tagline: Lịch sử trở thành huyền thoại.
data.title: Chúa Tể Của Những Chiếc Nhẫn: Cuộc Chiến của Rohirrim

data.overview: 183 anos antes dos eventos narrados na trilogia original, um ataque repentino de Wulf, um inteligente e implacável lorde Dunlending em busca de vingança pela morte de seu pai, força Helm Hammerhand e seu povo a fazer uma ousada última resistência na antiga fortaleza de Hornburg. Encontrando-se em uma situação cada vez mais desesperadora, Héra, a filha de Helm, deve reunir a vontade de liderar a resistência contra um inimigo mortal que pretende destruí-los totalmente.
data.title: O Senhor dos Anéis: A Guerra dos Rohirrim

data.overview: “2691—2759 9.“锤手”海尔姆。他统治的末期，洛汗因敌人入侵和漫长冬季遭受了重大损失。海尔姆和他的两个儿子哈烈斯和哈马都死了。海尔姆的外甥弗雷亚拉夫继承了王位。”猜测电影可能会涉及洛汗与黑蛮地人的战争、海尔姆率部退守深谷的惨烈故事，以及弗雷亚拉夫收复埃多拉斯成为国王等情节。
data.title: 指环王：洛汗之战

data.overview: Na een onverwachte aanval van Wulf, de slimme en meedogenloze leider van de Donkerlanders die de dood van zijn vader wil wreken, worden Helm Hamerhand, de legendarische koning van Rohan en zijn volk gedwongen hun toevlucht te zoeken in een oude veste, de Hoornburg — een sterke vesting in de vallei die later bekend zal worden als Helmsdiepte. Als Héra, de dochter van Helm, ziet dat hun situatie steeds uitzichtlozer wordt, verzamelt ze de moed om het verzet de leiden tegen een levensgevaarlijke vijand die eropuit is om ze uit te roeien.

Oryginalny animowany film fabularny produkcji New Line Cinema Władca Pierścieni: Wojna Rohirrimów to powrót do epickiego świata, który po raz pierwszy poznaliśmy dzięki trylogii Władca Pierścieni, powstałej na podstawie uwielbianych i kultowych książek J.R.R. Tolkiena.  Władca Pierścieni: Wojna Rohirrimów opowiada o losach rodu Helma Żelaznorękiego, legendarnego króla Rohanu. Niespodziewana napaść Wulfa, przebiegłego i bezwzględnego lorda Dunlendingów, szukającego zemsty za śmierć ojca, zmusza Helma i jego lud do stawienia czoła napastnikom w starożytnej twierdzy Hornburg – potężnej fortecy, która potem będzie znana jako Helmowy Jar. Widząc coraz bardziej rozpaczliwe położenie obrońców, Héra, córka Helma, musi pokierować oporem przeciwko śmiertelnemu wrogowi, którego celem jest wybicie ich do nogi.
data.title: Władca Pierścieni: Wojna Rohirrimów

data.overview: 故事背景設定在【魔戒】三部曲的183年前，講述傳奇洛汗國王聖盔鎚手的家族故事。為了替父親報仇，聰明又狡詐的登蘭德領袖沃夫突然發動攻襲，迫使聖盔與他的人民在遠古要塞號角堡面臨九死一生的背水一戰，此強大的要塞也在日後被稱為聖盔谷。聖盔之女赫拉也發現她所面臨的情勢日益險峻，她必須鼓起勇氣，率領反抗軍去對抗想要一舉殲滅他們的致命強敵。
data.title: 魔戒：洛汗人之戰

data.overview: เหตุการณ์ที่เกิดขึ้น 183 ปีก่อนเหตุการณ์ที่บันทึกไว้ในภาพยนตร์ไตรภาคต้นฉบับ “The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim” เล่าถึงชะตากรรมของ House of Helm Hammerhand กษัตริย์ในตำนานของ Rohan การโจมตีอย่างกะทันหันของ Wulf ลอร์ด Dunlending ที่ฉลาดและโหดเหี้ยมที่ต้องการล้างแค้นให้กับการตายของพ่อของเขา บังคับให้ Helm และผู้คนของเขาต้องยืนหยัดอย่างกล้าหาญเป็นครั้งสุดท้ายในฐานที่มั่นโบราณของ Hornburg ซึ่งเป็นป้อมปราการอันยิ่งใหญ่ที่จะเป็นที่รู้จักในภายหลัง เหมือนที่ Helm's Deep เมื่อพบว่าตัวเองตกอยู่ในสถานการณ์ที่สิ้นหวังมากขึ้นเรื่อยๆ Héra ลูกสาวของ Helm จึงต้องรวบรวมความตั้งใจที่จะเป็นผู้นำในการต่อต้านศัตรูที่อันตรายถึงชีวิตซึ่งมีเจตนาทำลายล้างพวกเขาให้สิ้นซาก
data.tagline: เมื่อประวัติศาสตร์กลายเป็นตำนาน
data.title: เดอะ ลอร์ด ออฟ เดอะ ริงส์: ศึกแห่งโรฮิริม

data.overview: 騎士の国ローハンは偉大なるヘルム王に護られていた。しかし突然の攻撃を受け、王国の平和が壊されていく。すべての運命は、一人の若き王女ヘラに託された！最大の敵はかつて共に育ったヘラの幼馴染ウルフ。果たしてヘラは、国の民の未来を救えるのか!? “あの指輪”をめぐる壮大な冒険へと繋がる、まだ誰も知らない伝説の戦いの幕が開ける！
data.title: ロード・オブ・ザ・リング／ローハンの戦い

data.overview: Náhlý útok vychytralého a nemilosrdného pána Vrchovců Wulfa, který touží pomstít smrt svého otce, přinutí krále Rohanu Helma Kladiva a jeho lid k odvážné obraně v prastaré pevnosti zvané Hláska.
data.title: Pán prstenů: Válka Rohirů

data.overview: ფენტეზური კინოტრილოგიის “ბეჭდების მბრძანებელი” ანიმაციური პრიკველი, რომელშიც მოქმედება ორიგინალურ ტრილოგიაში აღწერილ მოვლენებამდე 183 წლით ადრე ვითარდება და შუახმელეთის ერთ-ერთი ყველაზე ლეგენდარული ფიგურის, როჰანის მეცხრე მეფის ჰელმ ჰამერჰენდის და ჰორნბურგის ციხესიმაგრეების დაცვის შესახებ უთქმელ ამბავს მოგვითხრობს. მამის მკვლელობის გამო შურისძიებას მოწყურებული, დუნლენდის გონიერი და დაუნდობელი ლორდის, ვულფის უეცარი თავდასხმა, მეფე ჰელმის და მის ხალხს გაბედულ ბრძოლას აიძულებს ჰორნბურგის უძველეს ციტადელთან – ძლევამოსილი ციხესიმაგრე, რომელიც მოგვიანებით გახდება ცნობილი, როგორც ჰელმის ხრამი. ახლა სულ უფრო გამოუვალ სიტუაციაში აღმოჩენილ ჰელმის ქალიშვილმა, ჰერამ უნდა გამოავლინოს ნება, რათა გაუძღვეს წინააღმდეგობას სასიკვდილო მტრის წინააღმდეგ, რომელსაც განზრახული აქვს გაანადგუროს ისინი.
data.title: ბეჭდების მბრძანებელი: როჰირიმების ბრძოლა

data.overview: Smješten 183 godine prije događaja iz filmske trilogije „Gospodar prstenova”, Rat Rohirrima govori o Helmu Hammerhandu, legendarnom kralju Rohana, i njegovoj obitelji dok brane svoje kraljevstvo od vojske Dunlendinga. Helm i njegov narod prisiljeni su na hrabri posljednji otpor u drevnoj utvrdi Hornburg, koja će kasnije postati poznata kao Helmova Dubina. Dok se situacija iznimno pogoršava, Héru, Helmovu kćer, očekuje izazov da preuzme vodstvo otpora protiv smrtonosnog neprijatelja koji želi njihovo potpuno uništenje.
data.tagline: Nada još nije napustila ove zemlje.
data.title: Gospodar prstenova: Rat Rohirrima

data.overview: 183 anni prima degli aventi del Signore degli Anelli, Helm Mandimartello, re di Rohan, e la sua famiglia difendono il loro regno da un esercito di Dunlandiani. A prendersi il ruolo di protagonista della battaglia, però, è soprattutto Hèra, figlia di Helm dal temperamento ribelle che non esiterà a scendere in campo per difendere il proprio popolo.
data.title: Il Signore degli Anelli - La guerra dei Rohirrim

data.overview: 故事背景設定在【魔戒】三部曲的 183 年前，講述傳奇洛汗國王聖盔鎚手的家族故事。為了替父親報仇，聰明又狡詐的登蘭德領袖沃夫突然發動攻襲，迫使聖盔與他的人民在遠古要塞號角堡面臨九死一生的背水一戰，此強大的要塞也在日後被稱為聖盔谷。聖盔之女赫拉也發現她所面臨的情勢日益險峻，她必須鼓起勇氣，率領反抗軍去對抗想要一舉殲滅他們的致命強敵。

data.overview: מתקפה פתאומית על ידי וולף, לורד דונדני חכם ואכזר המבקש נקמה על מות אביו, מכריח את הלם יד-פטיש, המלך האגדי של רוהאן, ואנשיו להימלט ולהתבצר במצודת הורנברג – מצודה אדירה שבעתיד תהיה מוכרת בשם "מצודת הלם". לאחר שמוצאת את עצמה במצב נואש להחריד, הרה, בתו של הלם, חייבת לאזור כוחות ולהוביל את ההתנגדות כנגד אויב רצחני, המבקש את השמדתם המוחלטת.
data.title: שר הטבעות: מלחמת הרוהירים

data.overview: 183 години преди събитията от екранизираната трилогия, „Властелинът на пръстените: Войната на Рохиримите“ разказва за съдбата на Шлем Тежкоръки, легендарният крал на Рохан. Внезапната атака на Улф, умен и безпощаден дуноземски владетел, който търси отмъщение за смъртта на баща си, принуждава Шлем и хората му да се отправят към древните земи на Рогоскал – великата крепост, след това позната като Шлемово усое. Поставена в отчайваща ситуация, Хера – дъщерята на Шлем, трябва да намери сили и да ръководи съпротивата срещу смъртоносния враг, жадуващ напълно да унищожи народа им.
data.title: Властелинът на пръстените: Войната на Рохиримите

data.overview: Film, en ünlü Rohan krallarından Miğfer Tokmakel (Helm Hammerhand) döneminde Dunlandlılar ile yaşanan savaşı ve daha sonra Yüzüklerin Efendisi: İki Kule'de Orta Dünya'nın kaderini etkileyen Borukent Savaşı'nın geçtiği Miğfer Dibi'nin kralın ismiyle anılmasına sebep olan olayları anlatıyor.
data.title: Yüzüklerin Efendisi: Rohirrim'in Savaşı

data.overview: Peter Jackson predstvauje prelomovú cestu späť do Stredozeme očami legandárneho režiséra Kenjiho Kamiyamu!  Náhly útok Wulfa, šikovného a neľútostného pána Dunlendingu, ktorý hľadá pomstu za smrť svojho otca, prinúti Helma Hammerhanda, kráľa Rohanu, a jeho ľud, aby sa odvážne postavili naposledy v starobylej pevnosti Hornburg.
data.title: Pán prsteňov: Vojna Rohirov

data.overview: Situado 183 anos antes dos acontecimentos descritos na trilogia original de filmes, “O Senhor dos Anéis – A Guerra dos Rohirrim” conta o destino da Casa de Helm Hammerhand, o lendário Rei de Rohan. Um ataque repentino de Wulf, um inteligente e implacável senhor de Dunlending que procura vingança pela morte do seu pai, obriga Helm e o seu povo a fazer uma última e ousada resistência na antiga fortaleza de Hornburg – uma poderosa fortaleza que mais tarde será conhecida como o abismo de Helm. Encontrando-se numa situação cada vez mais desesperada, Héra, a filha de Helm, tem de reunir a vontade de liderar a resistência contra um inimigo mortal que pretende a sua destruição total.
data.title: O Senhor dos Anéis: A Guerra dos Rohirrim

data.overview: Ett plötsligt anfall från Wulf, en listig och hänsynslös Dunlendning-ledare som söker hämnd för sin fars död, tvingar Helm Hammarnäve, den legendariske kungen av Rohan, och hans folk att göra ett djärvt sista försök att försvara sig i den uråldriga fästningen Hornborgen, en mäktig fästning som senare kommer att bli känd som Helms klyfta. När situationen blir alltmer desperat, måste Helms dotter Héra samla modet att leda motståndet mot en dödlig fiende som är fast besluten att förgöra dem.
data.title: Sagan om ringen: Striden vid Rohan

data.overview: Zgodba se dogaja 183 let pred dogodki trilogije Gospodar prstanov in prikazuje usodo Helma Hammerhanda, legendarnega kralja Rohana, ter njegove hčerke Hére. Po nepričakovanem napadu Wulfa, maščevalnega gospoda Dunlendingov, se Helm in njegovi ljudje zatečejo v starodavno utrdbo Hornburg, ki bo kasneje postala znana kot Helmova soteska. Héra, ujetnica obupa, mora zbrati moč, da vodi odpor proti sovražniku, ki grozi z njihovim uničenjem.

data.overview: 183 tahun sebelum peristiwa yang diceritakan dalam trilogi asli, serangan mendadak oleh Wulf, seorang bangsawan Dunlending yang cerdik dan kejam yang ingin membalas dendam atas kematian ayahnya, memaksa Helm Hammerhand dan orang-orangnya untuk melakukan perlawanan terakhir yang berani di benteng kuno Hornburg. Menemukan dirinya dalam situasi yang semakin putus asa, Héra, putri Helm, harus mengumpulkan tekad untuk memimpin perlawanan terhadap musuh yang mematikan yang ingin menghancurkan mereka sepenuhnya.

Изненадни напад Вулфа, паметног и издајничког лорда Рохана који тражи освету за смрт свог оца, приморава Хелма Хамерхенда, краља Рохана, и његов народ да одваже последњи напад у древном упоришту Хорнбурга.

get.description: Query the details of a TV season

episodes.name: One on One
episodes.overview: Zandro's long-awaited one-on-one encounter with Tyrone has finally arrived. Meanwhile, Aster gets rid of all the research materials about the Buenavidezes that Jasmin had gathered in her home—at least, that is what she believes.

episodes.name: Make Peace
episodes.overview: With Zandro being dismissed from his position, Lavender suggests that he make peace with Tyrone instead. Meanwhile, Vittorio and Iris get ahold of Jasmin’s hitlist journal, bringing the former's past with Marigold to light.

episodes.name: Mind Games
episodes.overview: Tyrone expresses fondness for Camilla, oblivious to their true relationship. Later, he encounters Zandro again and openly criticizes Jasmin. Meanwhile, Iris and Vittorio enlist Lavender and Aster to organize BSM’s event.

episodes.name: Destined Reunion
episodes.overview: Tyrone joins Harry on a mission to hunt down the attackers of Iris and Vittorio. Meanwhile, a destined reunion unfolds during BSM's anniversary celebration.

episodes.name: Pain of the Past
episodes.overview: After her encounter with Tyrone, Lavender avoids any chance of crossing paths with him at the BSM’s anniversary event. Amid the luxurious arrangements and flowery speeches, a palpable tension fills the air at the mention of Marigold’s name.

episodes.name: Homebreaking
episodes.overview: Vittorio’s men break into Aster’s house, harming Mira in the process. The repeated mention of Marigold triggers Heather’s memories of the past. Meanwhile, Tyrone sneaks onto Aster’s property and spots a familiar face.

episodes.name: An Unexpected Knight in Shining Armor
episodes.overview: A car chase ensues as Harry and Tyrone pursue Zandro and Lavender. While Zandro fights fiercely against Harry, Lavender struggles to escape her pursuers until someone arrives to save her from certain death.

episodes.name: Ex-posed
episodes.overview: Tyrone comes clean to Lavender when an intense confrontation erupts between them until the latter reveals her shocking secret. Meanwhile, Zandro continues his pursuit of Tyrone.

episodes.name: Secrets Within Secrets
episodes.overview: An incident in the past haunts Vittorio. Tyrone gets to spend time with the most important person in his life. Meanwhile, tension rises between Zandro and Jasmin as the latter decides to accept Tyrone's help.

episodes.name: Cat in a Lion's Lair
episodes.overview: Despite her loved ones' objections, Lavender turns to the Buenavidezes and offers to work with them against Aster. Later on, however, Harry catches Lavender and Tyrone together.

episodes.name: Sham Alliances
episodes.overview: Tyrone and Lavender continue to play pretend, only for their enemies to see through their lies. Zandro stays with Lavender when an unsuspecting Aster pays Mira a surprise visit.

episodes.name: Loyalty Check
episodes.overview: As Harry’s investigation progresses, Vittorio opts to see where Tyrone’s loyalty truly lies. Meanwhile, Lavender finds herself caught in the middle of Tyrone and Zandro’s growing conflict.

episodes.name: Naked Truth
episodes.overview: Lavender takes Tyrone to Aster’s empty mansion to clean up after his altercation with Zandro. Little do they know, Iris knows exactly where to find them and is on her way to catch them red-handed.

episodes.name: Irreplaceable
episodes.overview: After discovering a piece of evidence linking Lavender to Jasmin Flores, Iris finds a way to verify it, all the while feigning ignorance in front of Tyrone. Meanwhile, Zandro comes to terms with his feelings for Lavender.

episodes.name: Hard Pill to Swallow
episodes.overview: Aster takes matters into her own hands to uncover the truth behind Marigold’s disappearance. Meanwhile, Lavender meticulously plans Iris and Tyrone’s anniversary celebration, unaware of the surprise her archenemy has in store for her.

episodes.name: Set the Record Straight
episodes.overview: Tyrone sets the record straight about his true feelings both for Iris and Jasmin. Meanwhile, Lily stumbles upon a recorded message from her late husband.

episodes.name: The Setup
episodes.overview: Iris shocks everyone with her speech at her and Tyrone’s anniversary party. Meanwhile, Vittorio’s men abduct Aster and Mira. In the face of death, Aster finally learns the truth about her daughter’s connection to Vittorio.

episodes.name: The Big Reveal
episodes.overview: Iris reveals to everyone that Lavender is Jasmin Flores. Meanwhile, Mira manages to escape, only to come face-to-face with Harry once again after Myrtle finds her and brings her home.

episodes.name: Unforeseen Grief
episodes.overview: While in hiding, Lavender learns of the tragedy that has struck Aster and Mira. Meanwhile, Camilla accidentally stumbles upon Lance’s confession video.

episodes.name: Behind Enemy Lines
episodes.overview: Lily finds herself on edge as Iris eagerly discusses her plan to find Tyrone and Jasmin’s missing child. Meanwhile, Lavender and Harry, each facing their own dilemma, turn to the same person for help.

episodes.name: The Choice
episodes.overview: Begged to work with the man he hates the most, Zandro makes a difficult choice. Meanwhile, Iris finally discovers who Tyrone and Jasmin’s missing child is.

episodes.name: Unbearable Bargain
episodes.overview: vWhile Mira mourns Aster’s death, Vittorio is arrested by the authorities for murder. Meanwhile, Jasmin races against time to get Camilla before Iris beats her to it.

episodes.name: Pivotal Partnerships
episodes.overview: Jasmin gets stopped at a police checkpoint as she makes her way to bring Camilla to their hideout. Meanwhile, Zandro receives a favorable return as he seals a partnership with Iris.

episodes.name: Tug of Hearts
episodes.overview: Tyrone arrives at Jasmin’s hideout, where he gets to spend quality time with her and their child. Thanks to the Buenavidezes' influence, Zandro gets reinstated at his job. Meanwhile,  Patrick discovers Lily’s hidden agenda.

episodes.name: Friends No More
episodes.overview: Patrick is forced to choose between love and his loyalty to the Buenavidezes when Ian dissuades him from reporting Lily’s escape plan to Iris. Meanwhile, Jasmin’s heart aches in silence as she realizes she does not know Camilla well enough.

episodes.name: Emergency
episodes.overview: Camilla’s allergic reaction sends Jasmin into a panic. Fortunately, Lily arrives in time to give them a ride to the hospital, unaware that she is being followed. Meanwhile, Tyrone tracks down the relocated production site of Vittorio’s illegal arms.

episodes.name: Changing Sides
episodes.overview: With Zandro switching sides, escaping the law becomes smoother for Vittorio. Meanwhile, Tyrone infiltrates the Buenavidezes' illegal weapons production site to gather evidence of their criminal operations.

episodes.name: Sinking Ship
episodes.overview: Lily learns the whole truth behind Lance’s death. Meanwhile, Vittorio’s company begins to sink under the weight of scandal after Tyrone exposed his family’s illegal activities to the public.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Mothers
episodes.overview: Lily and Jasmin share parenting duties for Camilla while struggling with their emotionally painful situation. Mira’s cry for justice throws Heather into a frenzy. To make matters worse, another crime committed by her family is exposed to the public.

episodes.name: Family Day
episodes.overview: Tyrone and Jasmin enjoy quality time with Camilla at an art museum, unaware that Zandro is reporting their whereabouts to Iris. As Vittorio and Heather prepare to leave the country, a truth-bearer follows the nagging voice of his conscience.

episodes.name: True Colors
episodes.overview: Vittorio and Heather’s attempt to escape is put to a halt. Meanwhile, Jasmin and Iris come face-to-face once more at the art museum. What starts as a tense encounter escalates into a bloody confrontation when Iris guns down Jasmin.

episodes.name: Behind Bars
episodes.overview: Iris is thrown behind bars after falling victim to Jasmin and Zandro’s trap. Meanwhile, Mira’s heart shatters once again as she confirms that the recovered remains are, indeed, her mother's.

episodes.name: A Tale of Two Fathers
episodes.overview: Despite Tyrone’s cooperation, Zandro still finds it hard to believe that the former is truly innocent in the deaths of his wife and son. While Vittorio remains convinced that everything he has done is for his family, Iris has a plan in mind.

episodes.name: Good Girl
episodes.overview: Iris tries to be a good girl behind bars in an effort to gain the public’s sympathy. Before turning himself in, Tyrone makes the most of his final moments with Camilla and finally confronts the truth he has long kept from Jasmin.

episodes.name: The Arrest
episodes.overview: Zandro arrests Tyrone, but took him to another place instead of the police station. Someone is following them. Iris receives in unexpected news.

episodes.name: Painful Decisions
episodes.overview: Harry confesses the whole truth to Zandro. Vittorio finds a way to get Iris out of jail. Lily and Patrick have a tough decision to make.

episodes.name: Unforgettable Celebration
episodes.overview: Tyrone makes the most of his time with Jasmin and Camilla and celebrates his birthday with them. Meanwhile, Iris is preparing to visit them.

episodes.name: The Uninvited
episodes.overview: Camilla remembers Lance while celebrating Tyrone's birthday. Iris then arrives to deliver a very special gift to Tyrone.

episodes.name: New Iris
episodes.overview: Iris tries to convince everyone that she has changed for the better. With Iris being free, Tyrone finds it harder to say goodbye to Jasmin at Camilla.

episodes.name: A Day at the Park
episodes.overview: Iris' friends surrender to authorities, affecting their children. Jasmin and Lily plans to tell the truth to Camilla, but Iris beats them.

episodes.name: The Godmother
episodes.overview: Jasmin and Tyrone’s worst nightmare as parents comes to life when Camilla goes missing, and they suspect that Iris is keeping her. Adding to their growing list of concerns, Tyrone is about to be transferred to the same penitentiary as Vittorio.

episodes.name: Unstoppable
episodes.overview: Despite Zandro’s objections, Jasmin remains unstoppable and infiltrates Iris' house, with Lily's help. Meanwhile, Heather finally regains consciousness.

episodes.name: A Mother's Dream
episodes.overview: Jasmin's dream turns into reality when Lily tells the truth to Camilla. Iris finds a new reason to hate Jasmin. Tyrone is transferred to another jail.

episodes.name: Riot
episodes.overview: Jasmin bids farewell to the people who helped her, including Lavender fields. Tyrone faces Vittorio and fights to stop Vittorio's evil plans.

episodes.name: The Breakout
episodes.overview: Tyrone escapes jail to warn Jasmin that Vittorio also escaped prison. Zandro and Eric get into a deadly encounter while bringing Iris to jail.

example.description: Comedians in Cars organized in Netflix's collections.

episodes.name: Jim Carrey: We Love Breathing What You're Burning, Baby
episodes.overview: Jerry’s full of testosterone as he steps into a ‘76 Lamborghini Countach with Jim Carrey, who’s between a three-week cleanse and a five-day silent retreat. After coffee, it’s off to Carrey’s studio to study a portrait of a gorilla with a machine gun. Wow.

episodes.name: Jimmy Fallon: The Unsinkable Legend: Part 1
episodes.overview: Jerry and his special guest Jimmy Fallon cruise over to Jerry's actual car in a 1956 Chevy Corvette convertible to hop aboard yet another vehicle to enjoy some comedic sailing out at sea.

episodes.name: Jimmy Fallon: The Unsinkable Legend: Part 2
episodes.overview: Jerry and his special guest Jimmy Fallon finish up their day on the water and head back to the mainland for John's Famous Pancake House and a cup of coffee.

episodes.name: Alec Baldwin: Just a Lazy Shiftless Bastard
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Alec Baldwin (30 Rock) drive a 1970 Mercedes Benz 280 SL to Fairway Market Café in New York City, NY for some coffee.

episodes.name: Stephen Colbert: Cut Up And Bloody But Looking Good
episodes.overview: Jerry rides shotgun with Stephen Colbert in a 1964 Morgan Plus 4, a British import that says you just don’t care what people think. He’s a late-night madman, according to Jerry, who’s impressed with Colbert’s beard and the manly way he pretends to smoke a pipe.

episodes.name: Sarah Jessica Parker: A Little Hyper-Aware
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Sarah Jessica Parker, sip a Starbucks while driving a 1976 Ford Country Station Wagon to Long Island’s Colony Diner ... for another cup of coffee.

episodes.name: Trevor Noah: That's the Whole Point of Apartheid, Jerry
episodes.overview: Jerry takes incoming Daily Show host Trevor Noah on a tour down under the Brooklyn Bridge, where they riff on football (aka, soccer), apartheid’s stupidity, and Noah’s insane daily routine.

episodes.name: Kristen Wiig: The Volvo-ness
episodes.overview: Jerry is ready to partay this week with comic goddess Kristen Wiig in the Season 9 premiere. The pair are taking a 1964 Volvo 122S Amazon to LA's iconic House of Pies.

episodes.name: John Oliver: What Kind of Human Animal Would Do This?
episodes.overview: In the Season 8 finale, Jerry and John Oliver (The Daily Show, Last Week Tonight) go for a coffee and comedy run in a 1959 Triumph TR3.

episodes.name: Chris Rock: Kids Need Bullying
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Chris Rock (Everybody Hates Chris), drive a 1967 Lamborghini Miura P400S to Allendale Eats in Allendale, NJ for some coffee.

episodes.name: Christoph Waltz: Champagne, Cigars, And Pancake Batter
episodes.overview: Academy Award® winner and Austrian national treasure Christoph Waltz has never tasted an IHOP pancake. Enter Jerry Seinfeld and a 1957 BMW 507 Series II Roadster to right this grievous wrong.

episodes.name: Tina Fey: Feces Are My Purview
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld (Seinfeld) and his special guest, Tina Fey (30 Rock), drive a 1967 Volvo 1800S to Floridita Restaurant for some coffee.

episodes.name: Aziz Ansari: It's Like Pushing a Building Off a Cliff
episodes.overview: Jerry takes the wheel of Aziz Ansari’s “flying brick,” a 2012 Prevost X3-45 VIP tour bus, and tries avoids trees and curbs before pulling into a truck stop diner for a quick meal and a cup o’ joe.

episodes.name: Ricky Gervais: Mad Man in a Death Machine
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Ricky Gervais (The Office), drive a 1967 Austin-Healey 3000 to City Island Diner in City Island, NY for some coffee.

episodes.name: Seth Meyers: Really?!
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Seth Meyers (Saturday Night Live), drive a 1973 Porsche 911 Carrera RS to the Roebling Tea Room in Brooklyn, NY for some coffee.

episodes.name: Norm MacDonald: A Rusty Car in the Rain
episodes.overview: Jerry is taking funnyman Norm MacDonald for a coffee run in a 1958 Porsche Speedster. Destination: Jackson Hole Diner in Queens.

episodes.name: Michael Richards: It's Bubbly Time, Jerry
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Michael Richards drive a 1962 Volkswagen Bus to The Malibu Kitchen in Malibu, CA for some coffee.

episodes.name: J.B. Smoove: Everybody Respects a Bloody Nose
episodes.overview: Jerry is kaffeeklatsching in L.A. this week with funnyman J.B. Smoove. They’re headed for brew at 10 Speed Coffee in a 1964 Studebaker Avanti.

episodes.name: Joel Hodgson: A Taste of Hell From on High
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Joel Hodgson (Jimmy Kimmel Live!), drive a 1963 Volkswagon Karmann Ghia to Skylark Diner in Edison, NJ for some coffee.

episodes.name: Ali Wentworth: I'm Going to Take a Percocet and Let That One Go
episodes.overview: Jerry and his special guest, Ali Wentworth go out for a spin in a low grill 1970 Mercedes 280SE Cabriolet to wasply grab some coffee.

episodes.name: President Barack Obama: Just Tell Him You're the President
episodes.overview: For the premiere episode of Season 7, Jerry takes President Barack Obama for a spin in a 1963 Corvette Stingray Split Window Coupe but finds it hard to spirit the leader of the free world off the White House grounds.

episodes.name: Kevin Hart: You Look Amazing in the Wind
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest Kevin Hart stylishly cruise around town in a 1959 Porsche RSK Spyder for their "weird male date." Plus special extra feature: "Dick Corcoran"

episodes.name: Will Ferrell: Mr. Ferrell, For the Last Time, We're Going to Ask You to Put the Cigar Out
episodes.overview: Will Ferrell says the secret to his comedy is that he looks like a banker but acts like a nut, which is why Jerry picks him up in a “happy, silly” 1970 Plymouth Road Runner SuperBird for a mid-day break.

episodes.name: Howard Stern: The Last Days of Howard Stern
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld (Seinfeld) and his special guest, Howard Stern (The Howard Stern Show), drive "The Judge" a 1969 Pontiac GTO to The Bel Aire Diner for some coffee in the season finale.

episodes.name: Carl Reiner & Mel Brooks: I Want Sandwiches, I Want Chicken
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guests, Carl Reiner (The Dick Van Dyke Show) & Mel Brooks (Blazing Saddles) drive a 1960 Rolls Royce Silver Cloud II & 1970 Porsche 911S to Norm's Diner in Los Angeles, CA for some coffee.

episodes.name: Julia Louis-Dreyfus: I'll Go If I Don't Have To Talk
episodes.overview: Jerry and the “James Bond of comedy” Julia Louis-Dreyfus reminisce as they share a cappuccino after cruising the Pacific Palisades in a 1964 Aston Martin DB5.

episodes.name: Don Rickles: You'll Never Play the Copa
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Don Rickles (The Tonight Show starring Johnny Carson), drive a 1958 Cadillac Eldorado to Factor's Famous Deli in Los Angeles, CA for some coffee.

episodes.name: Judd Apatow: Escape from Syosset
episodes.overview: Jerry grabs coffee with writer-director Judd Apatow at the 101 Coffee Shop in Los Angeles. The car: a 1968 Firebird 400 convertible.

episodes.name: David Letterman: I Like Kettlecorn
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, David Letterman (Late Show with David Letterman), drive a 1995 Volvo 960 to Green Granary in New Milford, CT for some coffee.

episodes.name: Amy Schumer: I'm Wondering What It's Like to Date Me
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest Amy Schumer check out “cute bongs” as they walk to a local diner for some coffee after their 1971 Ferrari Daytona breaks down.

episodes.name: Steve Harvey: Always Do the Banana Joke First
episodes.overview: Jerry and Steve Harvey prowl Chicago in a ‘57 Chevy Bel Air convertible, enjoy some fine cigars and muse about offensive jokes and the futility of comedy class.

episodes.name: Steve Martin: If You See This on a Toilet Seat, Don't Sit Down
episodes.overview: Jerry goes up to the country with Steve Martin in a beautiful but delicate 1954 Siata 8v and come back to the city in something else altogether. In between they converse about confidence, quitting and the best opening lines.

episodes.name: Jon Stewart: The Sound of Virginity
episodes.overview: When Jerry Seinfeld can no longer take driving a 1978 AMC Gremlin, guest Jon Stewart’s first car, he ditches it for its much bigger brother, a 1968 AMX, before they head over to the Tick Tock Diner in Clifton, NJ.

episodes.name: Patton Oswalt: How Would You Kill Superman?
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Patton Oswalt, drive a 1981 DeLorean DMC-12 to The Handsome Coffee Roasters for some coffee.

episodes.name: Jay Leno: Comedy is a Concealed Weapon
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Jay Leno, drive a 1949 Porsche 356/2 to Jones Coffee for Jay's first cup of coffee.

episodes.name: Jim Gaffigan: Stick Around for the Pope
episodes.overview: In the Season 8 premiere, Jerry roughs it with Jim Gaffigan in a 1977 Volkswagen Camper Bus, eats pastrami at the 2nd Avenue Deli.

episodes.name: Fred Armisen: I Wasn't Told About This... With Special Feature: I'm Dying, Jerry
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest Fred Armisen cruise over to Portland's Coava in a 1965 Saab 96 Monte Carlo 850 for some coffee.

episodes.name: Garry Shandling: It's Great That Garry Shandling Is Still Alive
episodes.overview: Garry Shandling rides shotgun in a 1979 Porsche 930 as he and Jerry goof on Matthew McConaughey and the Dalai Lama during a trip to Seinfeld’s old New York street set.

episodes.name: Cedric the Entertainer: Dictators, Comics, and Preachers
episodes.overview: Jerry is rolling out a 1958 Bentley S1 Continental for Cedric the Entertainer for a trip to The Butcher’s Daughter in NYC.

episodes.name: Margaret Cho: You Can Go Cho Again
episodes.overview: Jerry and pal Margaret Cho grab coffee at LA's Highland Cafe in a 1967 Mazda Cosmo Sport. Next thing we know, he's opening for her at The Stress Factory in New Jersey.

episodes.name: Lorne Michaels: Everybody Likes to See the Monkeys
episodes.overview: Jerry convinces comedy genius Lorne Michaels to open up about the show that made him famous. The car: a 1955 Mercedes 300SL Gullwing.

episodes.name: Brian Regan: A Monkey and a Lava Lamp
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Brian Regan (Late Show with David Letterman) drive a 1970 Dodge Challenger to Rae's Diner in Santa Monica, CA for some coffee.

episodes.name: Robert Klein: Opera Pimp
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his hero, Robert Klein, cruise around Westchester County, NY, in a ‘67 Jaguar Mark II to look for lunch and a hot brew and somehow wind up at Sing Sing prison.

episodes.name: Todd Barry: So You're Mellow and Tense?
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld (Seinfeld) and his special guest Todd Barry (Wanderlust) drive a 1966 MGB Roadster to Coney Island for a hot dog.

episodes.name: Barry Marder: You Don't Want to Offend a Cannibal
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Barry Marder (Bee Movie) drive a 1966 Porsche 356 SC Cabriolet to Bendix Diner in Hasbrouck Heights, NJ for some coffee.

episodes.name: Bill Maher: The Comedy Team of Smug and Arrogant
episodes.overview: Jerry chooses a 1979 VW Bug police car for good buddy Bill Maher because, as he says, Maher seems to have authority but actually has none. Case in point: when Maher talks politics, Jerry asks, “Boxers or briefs?”

episodes.name: Sarah Silverman: I’m Going To Change Your Life Forever
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld takes Sarah Silverman for a ride in a 1969 Jaguar E-Type Series 2 before stopping by Millie's Cafe in the Silver Lake section of Los Angeles for some food and coffee.

episodes.name: Bill Burr: Smoking Past the Band
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest Bill Burr cruise around L.A. in a 1970 Ford Mustang like a couple of bosses out on the town in the middle of the day.

episodes.name: Gad Elmaleh: No Lipsticks for Nuns
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Gad Elmaleh (Midnight in Paris), drive a 1950 Citroen 2CV to Pommes Frites & French Roast New York City, NY for some coffee.

episodes.name: Miranda Sings: Happy Thanksgiving Miranda
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest Miranda Sings cruise around town in a 1960 Austin Healey Sprite in search of coffee, complaining and apologizing along the way.

episodes.name: Larry David: Larry Eats a Pancake
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Larry David (Curb Your Enthusiasm), drive a 1952 Volkswagon Beetle to John O'Groats in Los Angeles, CA for some coffee

episodes.name: Sebastian Maniscalco: I Don't Think That's Bestiality
episodes.overview: In a perfect combination of guy, car and moment, Sebastian Maniscalco cruises the streets of L.A. with Jerry in a ‘69 Camaro Z/28 and talks about growing up in a Sicilian family, his grooming habits and having a mean resting face.

episodes.name: Lewis Black: At What Point Am I Out From Under?
episodes.overview: Jerry can’t take angry comedian Lewis Black anywhere. Watch Lewis rant with his mouth full at Junior's Cheesecake, and road-rage all over New York in a 1967 Cadillac Eldorado.

episodes.name: Colin Quinn & Mario Joyner: I Hear Downton Abbey is Pretty Good…
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guests, Colin Quinn (Grown Ups) & Mario Joyner (Everybody Hates Chris) drive a 1976 Triumph TR6 to Fort Defiance Café in Brooklyn, NY for some coffee.

episodes.name: Bob Einstein: Unusable on the Internet
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Bob Einstein (Super Dave), drive a 1970 Mercedes-Benz 300SEL 6.3 to Jerry's Deli in Studio City, CA and Nate 'n Al's in Beverly Hills, CA for some coffee.

episodes.name: Louis C.K.: Comedy, Sex and The Blue Numbers
episodes.overview: Jerry Seinfeld and his special guest, Louis C.K., drive a 1959 Fiat Jolly to Louie's boat for some coffee.

episodes.name: Kathleen Madigan & Chuck Martin: Stroked Out on a Hot Machine
episodes.overview: Jerry takes Kathleen Madigan and her buddy Chuck Martin out for a spin in Los Angeles as they ponder the pejorative meaning of the word “tool” and wonder why dads get no sports shout-outs.

episodes.name: George Wallace: Two Polish Airline Pilots
episodes.overview: Comedians Jerry Seinfeld and George Wallace reminisce about their over-35-year friendship while cruising the Las Vegas strip in a 1965 Buick Riviera before stopping at the famous Peppermill Restaurant.

episodes.name: Bob Einstein: It's Not So Funny When It's Your Mother
episodes.overview: In the season finale, Jerry’s buying pal Bob Einstein (aka Super Dave Osborne) coffee at Hollywood’s Urth Caffe and sandwiches at Bay Cities Deli & Bakery. If his guest is funny enough, Jerry might throw in a 2016 Acura NSX.

episodes.name: Zach Galifianakis: From The Third Reich To You
episodes.overview: Zach Galifianakis joins Jerry for bike shopping and doughnuts in a Volkswagen Thing before turning the tables and making Jerry sit between two ferns.

episodes.name: Dave Chappelle: Nobody Says, “I Wish I Had a Camera"
episodes.overview: In Washington, D.C., Jerry and Dave Chappelle take a ride in a 1973 Citroën Maserati SM and pay a visit to Dave's old high school.

episodes.name: Ellen DeGeneres: You Said It Wasn’t Funny
episodes.overview: Jerry picks up Ellen DeGeneres in a 1977 Toyota FJ40 Land Cruiser. They discuss her start in comedy, then Ellen teaches Jerry a lesson about car keys.

episodes.name: Tracy Morgan: Lasagna With Six Different Cheeses
episodes.overview: In a 1984 Ferrari 288 GTO, Jerry and Tracy Morgan do some grocery shopping, talk about raisins and hit a diner in Ridgewood, New Jersey.

episodes.name: Brian Regan: Are There Left Handed Spoons?
episodes.overview: Jerry picks up Brian Regan in Brian's favorite car, a Cadillac XLR convertible, and they get coffee and visit a golf shop (to Jerry's chagrin).

episodes.name: Dana Carvey: Na.. Ga.. Do.. It
episodes.overview: Dana Carvey and Jerry roll in a Meyers Manx dune buggy to the Beverly Hills Hotel for coffee, then Dana plays guitar for Jerry at a music store.

episodes.name: Hasan Minhaj: Nobody Cries At A Joke
episodes.overview: Jerry picks up basketball enthusiast Hasan Minhaj in a 1992 Ferrari 512 TR and tries to explain why baseball's better over coffee and pancakes.

episodes.name: Neal Brennan: Red Bottom Shoes Equals Fantastic Babies
episodes.overview: Jerry takes Neal Brennan to Hermosa Beach in a 1965 Porsche 356C Coupe to discuss comic philosophies and why they didn't watch each other's shows.

episodes.name: John Mulaney: A Hooker in the Rain
episodes.overview: In a 1969 Alfa Romeo Giulia Super, Jerry and John Mulaney do some rug shopping for John's apartment and head to Staten Island for pizza and coffee.

episodes.name: Kate McKinnon: A Brain in a Jar
episodes.overview: Kate McKinnon joins Jerry for a jaunt around Manhattan in a 1962 Fiat 600 Multipla, and they dive into topics like the Coriolis effect over coffee.

episodes.name: Alec Baldwin: Gyrating, Naked Twister
episodes.overview: Jerry picks up Alec Baldwin in a 1974 BMW 3.0 CS coupe, and they drive to their shared hometown of Massapequa, New York, to swap old stories.

episodes.name: Jerry Lewis: Heere’s Jerry!
episodes.overview: Jerry travels to Las Vegas in a 1966 Jaguar E-Type to spend time with his hero, Jerry Lewis, in what would be Lewis's final on-screen appearance.

episodes.name: Eddie Murphy: I Just Wanted To Kill
episodes.overview: Jerry picks up Eddie Murphy in a Porsche Carrera GT for a wide-ranging conversation about Eddie's career and coming up together in late-'70s New York.

episodes.name: Seth Rogen: We Have The Meats
episodes.overview: In a beat-up 1976 Dodge Monaco, Jerry and Seth Rogen get coffee and make an Arby's run while musing on fame, feelings, awards, beards and more.

episodes.name: Ricky Gervais: China Maybe? Part 1
episodes.overview: Jerry gets Ricky Gervais in a 2018 Rolls-Royce convertible, and their discussion includes whether or not to leave a stereotypical joke in the episode.

episodes.name: Ricky Gervais: China Maybe? Part 2
episodes.overview: Jerry and Ricky stop at a bakery, pounder unfunny comedians and Holocaust jokes, then try not to run out of things to say while stuck in traffic.

episodes.name: Matthew Broderick: These People That Do This Stuff. They Stink.
episodes.overview: In a 2018 Lamborghini Huracán, Jerry and Matthew Broderick roll by Matthew's old home, find trouble at Patagonia and live out a baseball fantasy.

episodes.name: Jamie Foxx: You Got To Get The Alligator Sweat
episodes.overview: Jerry takes a 1969 Maserati Mistral to New Orleans to meet Jamie Foxx. Jamie talks about his comedy inspiration and how he stays humble and hungry.

episodes.name: Sebastian Maniscalco: My Wife Didn't Know The Extent Of It
episodes.overview: Rolling around in vintage Italian scooters, Jerry and Sebastian Maniscalco discuss likes and dislikes and how comedians function in "normal" society.

episodes.name: Martin Short: A Dream World Of Residuals
episodes.overview: Martin Short talks about the '70s Toronto comedy scene and being funny on demand as he and Jerry drive around LA in a 1983 Mercedes station wagon.

episodes.name: Mario Joyner: He Should Have Been Done That
episodes.overview: In a 1974 VW Thing, Jerry and his old friend Mario Joyner hit up a barbershop, eat chicken and waffles, and discuss being a well-rounded entertainer.

episodes.name: Melissa Villaseñor
episodes.overview: Jerry and impressionist Melissa Villaseñor visit a Brooklyn food museum in a 1991 Nissan Figaro and talk funny voices and Silly Putty.

episodes.name: Bridget Everett: Still Hot To The Touch
episodes.overview: Cabaret performer Bridget Everett finds some pent-up anger in Jerry, and the pair get tarot readings while cruising in a 1961 Cadillac convertible.

episodes.name: Barry Marder: Big Lots and BevMo!
episodes.overview: Jerry picks up longtime friend Barry Marder in a 1966 Porsche 356 SC Cabriolet, and they rank bodily functions, go shopping and eat Twinkies.
